widgets.title: Daily Ingest Rate By Account (Time Series)

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT rate(sum(GigabytesIngested), 1 day) AS avgGbIngestTimeseries FROM NrConsumption WHERE productLine='DataPlatform' TIMESERIES AUTO since 9 months ago facet consumingAccountName limit max
SELECT rate(sum(GigabytesIngested), 30 day) AS avgGbIngest FROM NrConsumption WHERE productLine='DataPlatform' since 30 days ago facet usageMetric limit max COMPARE WITH 4 weeks ago
SELECT rate(sum(GigabytesIngested), 30 day) AS avgGbIngest FROM NrConsumption WHERE productLine='DataPlatform' since 30 days ago facet consumingAccountName limit max COMPARE WITH 4 weeks ago

rawConfiguration.text:
Resources
---
* [Manage Your Data UI](https://one.nr/0PLRE6A68ja)
* [Manage Your Data Docs](https://docs.newrelic.com/docs/telemetry-data-platform/manage-data/manage-your-data/)
* [Creating Baseline Alerts](https://docs.newrelic.com/docs/alerts-applied-intelligence/new-relic-alerts/alert-conditions/create-baseline-alert-conditions/)
* [Log Drop Filters](https://docs.newrelic.com/docs/logs/log-management/ui-data/drop-data-drop-filter-rules/)
* [Generic Data Drop Filters](https://docs.newrelic.com/docs/telemetry-data-platform/manage-data/drop-data-using-nerdgraph/)
* [Reduce Prometheus Remote Write Data](https://docs.newrelic.com/docs/telemetry-data-platform/manage-data/drop-data-using-nerdgraph/)
* K8s Data Reduction (Check with your New Relic SC)

widgets.title: Daily Ingest Rate (All Accounts / All Telemetry) - Compare with Prev. Month

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT rate(sum(GigabytesIngested), 1 day) AS avgGbIngestTimeseries FROM NrConsumption WHERE productLine='DataPlatform' TIMESERIES AUTO since 9 months ago limit max COMPARE WITH 4 weeks ago
SELECT rate(sum(GigabytesIngested), 1 day) AS avgGbIngestTimeseries FROM NrConsumption WHERE productLine='DataPlatform' TIMESERIES AUTO since 9 months ago limit max facet usageMetric
SELECT derivative(GigabytesIngested, 7 day) AS 'GB Ingest Derivative' FROM NrConsumption WHERE productLine='DataPlatform' TIMESERIES AUTO since 9 months ago limit max facet usageMetric
